sentences.sentence: Further deferment will not be allowed.
Drop-out and deferment rates are also hair-curling: only 40% of students graduate in four years.
sentences.translation: 退学和延期毕业率也明显上升：只有40%的学生在4年内毕业。

sentences.sentence: I was a farm boy and at the time I would have had a deferment from the draft as an only farm son.
sentences.translation: 我是一个农场男孩，那时候作为仅有的一个农场男孩我可以得到延期。
